name: @ngx-smart-forms/smart-file-upload
description: A customizable Angular component for handling file uploads with advanced validation options. Features include multiple file uploads, file type and size validation, image dimension checks, drag-and-drop support, lazy-loaded image previews, and theming support. Seamlessly integrates with Angular forms, providing a flexible and user-friendly file upload experience.
author: Adinan Alhassan <aditech5170@gmail.com>
